Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change between Belmont and California
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to track conditions at Logan Square; board all trains on the DIRECTION-bound side at Belmont, Logan Square and California

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running with delays due to a track condition near Logan Square.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Belmont and California stations.

Board/exit all trains on the O'Hare-bound side of the platform at California, Logan Square and Belmont.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
